pipeline_services.name: Data Extraction
pipeline_services.description: Extracts transcript, timing metadata, and file paths from video sources (YouTube API, future: speech-to-text)
pipeline_services.responsibility: Extract all available data and provide explicit file paths for robust pipeline processing

pipeline_services.name: Translation
pipeline_services.description: Pure text-to-text translation using OpenAI GPT models
pipeline_services.responsibility: Pure text translation with no timing or alignment concerns

pipeline_services.name: Alignment
pipeline_services.description: Synchronizes translated text with original speech timing metadata using configurable alignment strategies
pipeline_services.responsibility: Synchronize translated text with original timing, handle segment length mismatches, apply speech timing optimization

pipeline_services.name: Text-to-Speech
pipeline_services.description: Generates natural-sounding audio from aligned translated segments using OpenAI TTS or other engines
pipeline_services.responsibility: Convert aligned translated text to speech audio files

pipeline_services.name: Audio Processing
pipeline_services.description: Combines individual audio segments into a single synchronized audio track
pipeline_services.responsibility: Synchronize and combine translated audio segments

pipeline_services.name: Video Dubbing
pipeline_services.description: Creates final dubbed video by replacing original audio with translated audio using FFmpeg
pipeline_services.responsibility: Combine original video with translated audio track

pipeline_services.name: Storage & Result
pipeline_services.description: Saves all pipeline outputs and generates processing result with file paths
pipeline_services.responsibility: Persist all pipeline data and generate comprehensive processing results
